main event: A flaming object, similar to a phosphorous bomb, was observed over Watford City, North Dakota, on January 9, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as whitish in color and approximately 100 feet in diameter., It moved slowly and disappeared behind a hill., The sighting lasted about 10 minutes., The report came from a local cattleman in the area., This sighting was similar to a previous one reported by a military observer in Macon, Georgia.
sighted object: flaming object resembling a phosphorous bomb
